StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Asset, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax asset from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Provisional Income Tax Expense (Benefit) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax expense (benefit) for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.label: Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
UndistributedEarningsOfForeignSubsidiari.description: Amount of undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries intended to be permanently reinvested outside the country of domicile.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: Amount of the unrecorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssets.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Assets, Pledged (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedAssets.description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) assets that can only be used to settle obligations of VIE.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabil.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Liabilities, No Recourse (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabil.description: Amount of consolidated variable interest entity's (VIE) liabilities that do not have recourse to general credit of primary beneficiary.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Gross (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsGrossExcludingGoodwill.description: Amount before accumulated amortization of intangible assets, excluding goodwill.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Finite-Lived Intangibles
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of identifiable intangible assets recognized as of the acquisition date.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDev.label: Deferred Tax Assets, in Process Research and Development
DeferredTaxAssetsInProcessResearchAndDev.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from in-process research and development costs expensed in connection with a business combination.

MarketableSecuritiesNoncurrent.label: Marketable Securities, Noncurrent
MarketableSecuritiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as noncurrent.

RestructuringCharges.label: Restructuring Charges
RestructuringCharges.description: Amount of expenses associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

DistributedEarnings.label: Distributed Earnings
DistributedEarnings.description: The total amount of dividends declared in the period for each class of stock and the contractual amount of dividends (or interest on participating income bonds) that must be paid for the period (for example, unpaid cumulative dividends). Dividends declared in the current period do not include dividends declared in respect of prior-period unpaid cumulative dividends. Preferred dividends that are cumulative only if earned are deducted only to the extent that they are earned.

Dividends.label: Dividends
Dividends.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities, and addition from assumption of issuance of common shares for dilutive potential common shares; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToComm.label: Undistributed Earnings (Loss) Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
UndistributedEarningsLossAvailableToComm.description: Amount of undistributed earnings (loss) allocated to common stock as if earnings had been distributed. Excludes distributed earnings.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDivi.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Dividends in Excess of Retained Earnings
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalDivi.description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.

LossContingencyAccrualPayments.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Payments
LossContingencyAccrualPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow reducing loss contingency liability.
